Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people needing to communicate over a distance.
The student can include a string telephone in the drawing, showing how it connects the two people.
The student can represent that the string telephone uses sound to send messages.
The student can depict any materials or components used to construct the string telephone.
The student can illustrate the string as being stretched tight between the two cups so that it can transmit sound effectively.
The student can demonstrate how using a string telephone helps people communicate when far apart.
